Text.Value: Feign a prayer while your patron thieves the altar's magic.
Offer prayer and devotion to the Dark Lady.
Pray at the altar.

EditorData.logicalname: Active Roll (Religion) SH Enemy of Shar

Text.Value: *Your patron tugs briefly at the back of your mind - Lady Shar has left a boon in this altar for her faithful.*
Sel√ªne's rival, but also her sister. Offer a prayer of reconciliation.
*Nothing. No instruction or encouragement from the Dark Lady. The silence devours all.*
Silently swear your body and soul to Shar. Give yourself over entirely.
*The faintest sensation of approval quickens your heart. A hard-won blessing from your Mistress.*
*A small prickle of dread finds your heart as you look upon the altar.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player stands before an altar of Shar.

Text.Value: Pray at the altar.
Such a noble shrine. I fail to understand why some speak ill of Shar. She radiates grace.

EditorData.logicalname: DOESN'T KNOW SH IS SHAR WORSHIPPER

Text.Value: Bow your head and listen for Shar's presence.
*A contented emptiness washes over you as you gaze upon the altar.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player stands before an altar of Shar.

Text.Value: *A flicker of anxiety comes to you as you look upon the altar. Why was it so difficult to receive Shar's blessing...?*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player stands before an altar of Shar.

Text.Value: *A pleasurable shiver runs down your spine. You feel as though you've unburdened a troubling thought and forgotten it forever.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player's head bowed in silent prayer (still standing)

Text.Value: Shar is not your mistress, but she is worthy of respect. Offer her a prayer.
Sel√ªne's rival, but also her sister. Offer a prayer of reconciliation.

EditorData.logicalname: SELUNE FOLLOWER/COM SH = ENEMY OF SHAR

Text.Value: Shar is not your mistress, but she is worthy of respect. Offer her a prayer.

EditorData.logicalname: EVIL CLERIC/COM SH = ENEMY OF SHAR

Text.Value: *An overwhelming satisfaction - both innate and exterior - runs across your being. Your patron is pleased.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player stands before an altar of Shar.

Text.Value: A place of offering to the Dark Lady. May she embrace the entire world.
Leave.
*You feel a dancing fey smirk - to steal a blessing from Shar's faithful would be most mischevious.*
*A deep, ancient contempt wells within you - to steal a boon from these upstart gods would only be right.*
*A fiendish chuckle sounds throughout your very soul - to steal the blessing of a god could be most delicious.*
*A wave of anxiety washes over you as you look upon the statue. Why did Shar withhold her blessing?*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player stands before an altar of Shar.

Text.Value: *Your show of fidelity is answered by silence. Your heart numbs.*
*Your prayers fade away. Nothing comes to you in return - no soothing presence, no spiritual embrace. Only darkness and silence.*
*Your efforts must be inadequate. You must do more to please Shar, going forward.*
*Your silent gesture vanishes into a pitiless, dark void. Your heart aches faintly with an inexplicable feeling of loss.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player's head bowed in silent prayer (still standing)

Synopsis: The player discovers an altar in the temple of Shar. They can choose to pray at it, with the chance to receive a buff or debuff depending on the outcome of a religion check. Shar and Selune tags automatically get buff and debuff respectively. Avatar Shadowheart gets a unique and ambigous outcome, casting some doubt on her standing with her goddess.
